headline: Show HN: Open-source testing tool for SAML SSO integrations (mocksaml.com)
description:
Hi HN, we are Deepak and Sama, co-founders of BoxyHQ (https://boxyhq.com/). BoxyHQ provides an open-source platform for developers to quickly integrate enterprise features into their software solutions. These include SAML Single Sign-On (SSO), Audit logs, with more to come :)

We know how tedious SAML SSO integrations can be, so we built a free tool to help you with testing the feature as you go about building it. Mock SAML emulates a SAML Identity Provider and lets you test both Service Provider and Identity Provider flows without having to create accounts or users. Head over to https://mocksaml.com to try it out, there’s no registration required.

We have also open-sourced the code (Apache 2.0 license), so feel free to head over to https://github.com/boxyhq/mock-saml and self-host the service or even better make it part of your CI/CD pipeline to add SAML tests.

Our team would love to hear your feedback, you can also reach out to me at deepak@boxyhq.com
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: SAML SSO集成的开源测试工具（mocksaml.com）。
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: SAML SSO集成的開源測試工具（mocksaml.com）。
description_zh-Hans:
HN你好，我们是BoxyHQ（https://boxyhq.com/）的联合创始人Deepak和Sama。BoxyHQ为开发者提供了一个开源的平台，使他们能够快速地将企业功能整合到他们的软件解决方案中。这些功能包括SAML单点登录（SSO）、审计日志，还有更多的功能:)

我们知道SAML SSO的集成是多么的繁琐，所以我们建立了一个免费的工具来帮助你在构建该功能时进行测试。Mock SAML模拟了一个SAML身份提供者，让你测试服务提供商和身份提供者的流程，而无需创建账户或用户。

我们还开放了代码（Apache 2.0许可），所以请随时访问https://github.com/boxyhq/mock-saml，并自行托管该服务，或者最好使其成为您的CI/CD管道的一部分，以添加SAML测试。

我们的团队非常希望听到您的反馈，您也可以通过deepak@boxyhq.com 与我联系。
